Select a connection in the Remote Systems view and choose contextmenu > Copy or contextmenu > Move to move it to a team profile.

I consider this a major issue, since I think it is a regression, and it is the only way to enable team support for connections.

Operation fails, PDE Error Log logs:

I don't think this is a regression, but a new bug.
The exception is not specific to copy or move a connection.  The bug was due to not having a null-pointer check in setUserId() when the id had not been set before.   I fixed that earlier today.
